body_html:
@knandanan which CAddTable are you talking about? This is a legacy Torch function, and I believe is only present in the legacy part of PyTorch, and is not maintained anymore.
For completeness, here is how it's implemented in PyTorch (and similarly in Torch)

@knandanan which CAddTable are you talking about? This is a legacy Torch function, and I believe is only present in the legacy part of PyTorch, and is not maintained anymore.
For completeness, here is how it's implemented in PyTorch (and similarly in Torch)
body:
@knandanan which CAddTable are you talking about? This is a legacy Torch function, and I believe is only present in the `legacy` part of PyTorch, and is not maintained anymore.
For completeness, [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/legacy/nn/CAddTable.py) is how it's implemented in PyTorch (and similarly in Torch)
